name: learnosity-bootcamp
author: Mark Watson
description: An exploration into the application of Learnosity's different API's.

scripts.npm:develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.yarn:develop: concurrently "cd server && yarn run watch" "cd client && yarn start"
scripts.npm:install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
